# conversationContext(_:didChange:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the input delegate when text has changed in the input object for a conversation.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func conversationContext(_ context: UIConversationContext?, didChange textInput: (any UITextInput)?)
```
